question: Among the books published by publisher ID 1929, how many of them have over 500 pages?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book WHERE publisher_id = 1929 AND num_pages > 500

question: What is the publication date of the book with the most pages?
query: SELECT publication_date FROM book ORDER BY num_pages DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the name of the publisher of the book "The Illuminati"?
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Illuminati'

question: How many books were published by publisher "Thomas Nelson"?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Thomas Nelson'

question: What is the name of the publisher that has published the most number of books?
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id GROUP BY T2.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(T1.book_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Please give the title of the oldest book published by publisher "Thomas Nelson".
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Thomas Nelson' ORDER BY T1.publication_date ASC LIMIT 1

question: Among the books published by publisher "Thomas Nelson", how many of them have over 300 pages?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Thomas Nelson' AND T1.num_pages > 300

question: What is the name of the publisher of the book with the most pages?
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id ORDER BY T1.num_pages DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many books are in English?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T2.language_name = 'English'

question: Please list the titles of all the books in British English.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T2.language_name = 'British English'

question: What is the cheapest order price of the book "The Little House"?
query: SELECT MIN(T2.price) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Little House'

question: Please list the titles of all the books that Lucas Wyldbore has ordered.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T4.first_name = 'Lucas' AND T4.last_name = 'Wyldbore'

question: Among the books ordered by Lucas Wyldbore, how many of them are over 300 pages?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T4.first_name = 'Lucas' AND T4.last_name = 'Wyldbore' AND T1.num_pages > 300

question: What is the total price of all the books ordered by Lucas Wyldbore?
query: SELECT SUM(T1.price) FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T2.order_id = T1.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T3.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T3.first_name = 'Lucas' AND T3.last_name = 'Wyldbore'

question: How much money on average does Lucas Wyldbore spend on book orders?
query: SELECT SUM(T1.price) / COUNT(*) FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T2.order_id = T1.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T3.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T3.first_name = 'Lucas' AND T3.last_name = 'Wyldbore'

question: Among the books ordered by Lucas Wyldbore, what is the percentage of those books over $13?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.price > 13 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T2.order_id = T1.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T3.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T3.first_name = 'Lucas' AND T3.last_name = 'Wyldbore'

question: Which city does the address id 547 belong to?
query: SELECT city FROM address WHERE address_id = 547

question: How many orders has Cordy Dumbarton made?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Cordy' AND T1.last_name = 'Dumbarton'

question: List the title of the earliest published Japanese book.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T2.language_name = 'Japanese' ORDER BY T1.publication_date ASC LIMIT 1

question: For the publisher which published the most books, show its name.
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id GROUP BY T2.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.publisher_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many books were published by Kensington?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.book_id) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Kensington'

question: Which language was book id 1405 written in?
query: SELECT T2.language_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T1.book_id = 1405

question: Which customer has made the most orders? Show his/her full name.
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.first_name, T1.last_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Name the book title of the bestseller.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id GROUP BY T1.title ORDER BY COUNT(T1.title) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many books did David Foster Wallace write?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.title) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'David Foster Wallace'

question: How many orders does the book "O Xará" have?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T1.title = 'O Xará'

question: Which country does Malina Johnson live in?
query: SELECT T4.country_name FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN customer_address AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN address AS T3 ON T3.address_id = T2.address_id INNER JOIN country AS T4 ON T4.country_id = T3.country_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Malina' AND T1.last_name = 'Johnson' AND T2.status_id = 2

question: Give the number of Ukrainian addresses in the database.
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM country AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.country_id = T2.country_id WHERE T1.country_name = 'Ukraine'

question: Which country does Žirovnica city belong to?
query: SELECT T1.country_name FROM country AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.country_id = T2.country_id WHERE T2.city = 'Žirovnica'

question: Calculate the percentage of the International shipping orders on 2022/11/10.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.method_name = 'International' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM shipping_method AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T1.method_id = T2.shipping_method_id WHERE T2.order_date LIKE '2022-11-10%'

question: What is the average number of pages of David Coward's books?
query: SELECT AVG(T1.num_pages) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'David Coward'

question: What is the cost of the slowest and least expensive shipping method?
query: SELECT method_name FROM shipping_method ORDER BY cost ASC LIMIT 1

question: What is the title of the first book that was published in 1900?
query: SELECT title FROM book WHERE STRFTIME('%Y', publication_date) = '1900' ORDER BY publication_date LIMIT 1

question: What is the full name of the customer who owns the "aalleburtonkc@yellowbook.com" e-mail address?
query: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE email = 'aalleburtonkc@yellowbook.com'

question: How many orders in 2022 have Iran as their destinations?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM country AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.country_id = T2.country_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.dest_address_id = T2.address_id WHERE T1.country_name = 'Iran' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T3.order_date) = '2022'

question: Among Daisey Lamball's orders, how many were shipped via International shipping?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T3 ON T3.method_id = T2.shipping_method_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Daisey' AND T1.last_name = 'Lamball' AND T3.method_name = 'International'

question: What is the full name of the customer who ordered the most books of all time?
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.first_name, T1.last_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many orders did Antonia Poltun return?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_status AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T1.status_value = 'Returned' AND T4.first_name = 'Antonia' AND T4.last_name = 'Poltun'

question: Which shipping method is preferred by customers the most?
query: SELECT T2.method_name FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T2 ON T1.shipping_method_id = T2.method_id GROUP BY T2.method_name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.method_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many orders were delivered in 2021?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_status AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE T1.status_value = 'Delivered' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T2.status_date) = '2021'

question: What is the name of the first book written by J.K Rowling?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'J.K. Rowling' ORDER BY T1.publication_date ASC LIMIT 1

question: How many books did A.R. Braunmuller write?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM author AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T1.author_name = 'A.R. Braunmuller'

question: What is the name of the publisher who published Agatha Christie's first book?
query: SELECT T4.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T4.publisher_id = T1.publisher_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Agatha Christie' ORDER BY T1.publication_date ASC LIMIT 1

question: List all the names of the books written by Danielle Steel.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Danielle Steel'

question: How many books by William Shakespeare were published by Penguin Classics?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T4.publisher_id = T1.publisher_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'William Shakespeare' AND T4.publisher_name = 'Penguin Classics'

question: What is the name of the publisher that published the most books?
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id GROUP BY T2.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.publisher_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the total shipping cost of all the orders made by Page Holsey? Indicate how many of the said orders were ordered in 2022.
query: SELECT SUM(T3.cost) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T3 ON T3.method_id = T2.shipping_method_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Page' AND T1.last_name = 'Holsey' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T2.order_date) = '2022'

question: What is the name of the publisher with publisher ID 22?
query: SELECT publisher_name FROM publisher WHERE publisher_id = 22

question: How many of the books authored by Al Gore have less than 400 pages?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Al Gore' AND T1.num_pages < 400

question: List the author's and publisher's name of the book published on July 10, 1997.
query: SELECT T3.author_name, T4.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T4.publisher_id = T1.publisher_id WHERE T1.publication_date = '1997-07-10'

question: What is the language of the book with ISBN 23755004321?
query: SELECT T2.language_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T1.isbn13 = 23755004321

question: What is the title of the most expensive book?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id ORDER BY T2.price DESC LIMIT 1

question: Calculate the total price of books ordered by customer named Lucas Wyldbore.
query: SELECT SUM(T1.price) FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T2.order_id = T1.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T3.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T3.first_name = 'Lucas' AND T3.last_name = 'Wyldbore'

question: List the ISBN of the book published in Spanish.
query: SELECT T1.isbn13 FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T2.language_name = 'Spanish'

question: Among the books that cost less than 1 dollar, how many were published by Berkley Trade?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN order_line AS T3 ON T3.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T1.publisher_name = 'Berkley' AND T3.price < 1

question: List the title of the books purchased by the customer named Zia Roizin.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T4.first_name = 'Zia' AND T4.last_name = 'Roizin'

question: Who authored the book with greatest number of pages?
query: SELECT T3.author_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id ORDER BY T1.num_pages DESC LIMIT 1

question: List the email of customers that bought the book titled Switch on the Night.
query: SELECT T4.email FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T1.title = 'Switch on the Night'

question: List the author's name of the books published by Abrams.
query: SELECT T3.author_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T4.publisher_id = T1.publisher_id WHERE T4.publisher_name = 'Abrams'

question: What is the publisher name of the book titled The Illuminati?
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Illuminati'

question: In books authored by Abraham Lincoln, what is the percentage of the books published in 1992?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN STRFTIME('%Y', T1.publication_date) = '1992' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Abraham Lincoln'

question: Among the books published in 2004, list the name of the publisher of books with number of pages greater than 70% of the average number of pages of all books.
query: SELECT T1.title, T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE STRFTIME('%Y', T1.publication_date) = '2004' AND T1.num_pages * 100 > ( SELECT AVG(num_pages) FROM book ) * 70

question: Provide the contact email of Moss Zarb.
query: SELECT email FROM customer WHERE first_name = 'Moss' AND last_name = 'Zarb'

question: Name the streets in Dallas.
query: SELECT street_name FROM address WHERE city = 'Dallas'

question: Which books were released by Orson Scott Card in 2001?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Orson Scott Card' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T1.publication_date) = '2001'

question: Count the number of books written by Orson Scott Card.
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Orson Scott Card'

question: Provide the authors and titles of the books which have more than 3000 pages.
query: SELECT T3.author_name, T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T1.num_pages > 3000

question: Who wrote "The Prophet"?
query: SELECT T3.author_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Prophet'

question: How many books were published by Ace Hardcover?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Ace Hardcover'

question: Which publisher published Barry Eisler's book?
query: SELECT T4.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T4.publisher_id = T1.publisher_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Barry Eisler'

question: How many books were published in Japanese?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.book_id) FROM book_language AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T1.language_name = 'Japanese'

question: Sum the total price of the orders for The Prophet book.
query: SELECT SUM(T1.price) FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T2.title = 'The Prophet'

question: Provide the number of orders by Daisey Lamball in 2021.
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'Daisey' AND T2.last_name = 'Lamball' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T1.order_date) = '2021'

question: How many customers are from Australia?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_address AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T2.address_id = T1.address_id INNER JOIN country AS T3 ON T3.country_id = T2.country_id WHERE T3.country_name = 'Australia'

question: How many orders were delivered in December 2019?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_status AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE T1.status_value = 'Delivered' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T2.status_date) = '2019'

question: Provide the customers' names who ordered the Fantasmas.
query: SELECT T4.first_name, T4.last_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T1.title = 'Fantasmas'

question: How many percent of orders in 2020 used international shipping?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.method_name = 'International' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T2 ON T1.shipping_method_id = T2.method_id WHERE STRFTIME('%Y', T1.order_date) = '2020'

question: List all the authors named "George".
query: SELECT author_name FROM author WHERE author_name LIKE 'George%'

question: Which year has the most customer orders?
query: SELECT strftime('%Y', order_date) FROM cust_order GROUP BY strftime('%Y', order_date) ORDER BY COUNT(strftime('%Y', order_date)) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the average price for the order line?
query: SELECT AVG(price) FROM order_line

question: List all of the books that were published in 1995.
query: SELECT title FROM book WHERE STRFTIME('%Y', publication_date) = '1995'

question: What is the most common domain for the email address among all the customers?
query: SELECT SUBSTR(email, INSTR(email, '@') + 1, LENGTH(email) - INSTR(email, '@')) AS ym FROM customer GROUP BY SUBSTR(email, INSTR(email, '@') + 1, LENGTH(email) - INSTR(email, '@')) ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many publishers have the word "book" in their name?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM publisher WHERE publisher_name LIKE '%book%'

question: Which language is the rarest among all the books?
query: SELECT T2.language_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id GROUP BY T2.language_name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.language_name) ASC LIMIT 1

question: List all the order dates for the customer named "Adrian Kunzelmann".
query: SELECT T3.order_date FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T4.first_name = 'Adrian' AND T4.last_name = 'Kunzelmann'

question: How many addresses are from the Philippines?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.country_id) FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T2.country_id = T1.country_id WHERE T2.country_name = 'Philippines'

question: Who is the author who wrote the most books?
query: SELECT T1.author_name FROM author AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.author_id = T2.author_id GROUP BY T1.author_name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.author_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What are the books published by "Harper Collins"?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Harper Collins'

question: How many orders were returned in the year 2020?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_status AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE T1.status_value = 'Returned' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T2.status_date) = '2020'

question: What is the second-least common method of shipping?
query: SELECT T2.method_name FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T2 ON T1.shipping_method_id = T2.method_id GROUP BY T2.method_name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.method_id) ASC LIMIT 1, 1

question: How many of the customer addresses are inactive?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_address AS T1 INNER JOIN address_status AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE T2.address_status = 'Inactive'

question: What is the book with the most orders?
query: SELECT T2.title FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id GROUP BY T2.title ORDER BY COUNT(T1.book_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the address that received the most orders?
query: SELECT T2.street_name, T2.city FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.dest_address_id = T2.address_id GROUP BY T2.street_number, T2.street_name, T2.city ORDER BY COUNT(T1.dest_address_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How much time does it take to update the status of order "2398"?
query: SELECT strftime('%J', T2.status_date) - strftime('%J', T1.order_date) FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id WHERE T1.order_id = 2398

question: Which customer has the most addresses?
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN customer_address AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.first_name, T1.last_name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.customer_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What percentage of the total prices of all orders are shipped internationally?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T3.method_name = 'International' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T3 ON T3.method_id = T1.shipping_method_id

question: List all the authors who wrote fewer pages than the average.
query: SELECT T3.author_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T1.num_pages < ( SELECT AVG(num_pages) FROM book )

question: Other than zero, what is the lowest price paid by a customer for an order?
query: SELECT MIN(price) FROM order_line WHERE price <> 0

question: How many customers have an address that is located in the city of Villeneuve-la-Garenne?
query: SELECT COUNT(address_id) FROM address WHERE city = 'Villeneuve-la-Garenne'

question: How many authors are named Adam?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM author WHERE author_name LIKE 'Adam%'

question: How many customers use a Yahoo! Mail e-mail address?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer WHERE email LIKE '%@yahoo.com'

question: What are the city addresses of the customers located in the United States of America?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.city FROM country AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.country_id = T2.country_id WHERE T1.country_name = 'United States of America'

question: How many orders did Marcelia Goering place in 2021 that uses the Priority Shipping method?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T3 ON T3.method_id = T2.shipping_method_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Marcelia' AND T1.last_name = 'Goering' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T2.order_date) = '2021' AND T3.method_name = 'Priority'

question: Which books have the most expensive price?
query: SELECT T2.title FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id ORDER BY T1.price DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many customers ordered the book titled "Anleitung zum Zickigsein"
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T1.title = 'Anleitung zum Zickigsein'

question: What is the most expensive price paid by a customer for the book "Bite Me If You Can (Argeneau #6)"?
query: SELECT MAX(T2.price) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T1.title = 'Bite Me If You Can (Argeneau #6)'

question: How many customers ordered the oldest book?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id GROUP BY T1.publication_date ORDER BY T1.publication_date ASC LIMIT 1

question: List all the titles of the Spanish books published by Alfaguara.
query: SELECT T2.title FROM book_language AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T2.language_id = T1.language_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T3.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.language_name = 'Spanish' AND T3.publisher_name = 'Alfaguara' GROUP BY T2.title

question: How many customers ordered Stephen King's first book?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.publication_date) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN order_line AS T4 ON T4.book_id = T1.book_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Stephen King' ORDER BY T1.publication_date ASC LIMIT 1

question: What are the languages of the first two published books?
query: SELECT T2.language_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id ORDER BY T1.publication_date ASC LIMIT 2

question: Who published the book "The Secret Garden"?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Secret Garden'

question: Among the books that were published by Scholastic, how many were written by J.K Rowling?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN book_author AS T3 ON T3.book_id = T1.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T4 ON T4.author_id = T3.author_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Scholastic' AND T4.author_name = 'J.K. Rowling'

question: What are the names of all the publishers who have published at least 30 books?
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id GROUP BY T2.publisher_name HAVING COUNT(T2.publisher_name) >= 30

question: Indicate the last number of each street.
query: SELECT street_number FROM address

question: Indicate the complete address of customers located in Lazaro Cardenas.
query: SELECT street_number, street_name, city, country_id FROM address WHERE city = 'Lazaro Cardenas'

question: Indicate the ISBN13 of all the books that have less than 140 pages and more than 135.
query: SELECT isbn13 FROM book WHERE num_pages < 140 AND num_pages > 135

question: Indicate the title of the six books with the greatest potential value as collectibles.
query: SELECT title FROM book ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 6

question: How many books were ordered in the last month of the year 2020?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cust_order WHERE order_date LIKE '2020-12%'

question: Indicate the full name of all customers whose last name begins with the letter K.
query: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE last_name LIKE 'K%'

question: In which cities are the customers of Costa Rica located?
query: SELECT T1.city FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T2.country_id = T1.country_id WHERE T2.country_name = 'Costa Rica'

question: Which customer addresses are no longer active?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.street_name FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN customer_address AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id INNER JOIN address_status AS T3 ON T3.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE T3.address_status = 'Inactive'

question: What is the full name of the customers who live in Baiyin city?
query: SELECT T3.first_name, T3.last_name FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN customer_address AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T3.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T1.city = 'Baiyin'

question: What is the email of the customers who place their orders with priority method?
query: SELECT T1.email FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T3 ON T3.method_id = T2.shipping_method_id WHERE T3.method_name = 'Priority'

question: On what date did the customers who live at number 460 of their respective streets place their orders?
query: SELECT T1.order_date FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.dest_address_id = T2.address_id WHERE T2.street_number = 460

question: Identify by their id all the orders that have been cancelled.
query: SELECT T2.order_id FROM order_status AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE T1.status_value = 'Cancelled'

question: What is the status of the orders placed on 04/10/2022?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.status_value FROM order_status AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id WHERE T3.order_date LIKE '2022-04-10%'

question: What is the highest price at which a customer bought the book 'The Prophet'?
query: SELECT MAX(T2.price) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Prophet'

question: On what dates were books ordered at a price of 16.54?
query: SELECT T1.order_date FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id WHERE T2.price = 16.54

question: List the titles of all the books that Peter H. Smith wrote.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Peter H. Smith'

question: How many books under 300 pages has HarperCollins Publishers published?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'HarperCollins Publishers' AND T1.num_pages < 300

question: How many books have been published in Japanese?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_language AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T1.language_name = 'Japanese'

question: What is the average number of pages in the books written by Jennifer Crusie?
query: SELECT AVG(T1.num_pages) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Jennifer Crusie'

question: What percentage of the orders placed by Kaleena were shipped by the international method?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T3.method_name = 'International' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T3 ON T3.method_id = T2.shipping_method_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Kaleena'

question: Provide the full name of the customers who have ordered the book The Sorrows of Young Werther.
query: SELECT T4.first_name, T4.last_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Sorrows of Young Werther'

question: List every book that Ursola Purdy has ordered.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T4.first_name = 'Ursola' AND T4.last_name = 'Purdy'

question: Who is the author of the book with the biggest page count?
query: SELECT T3.author_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id ORDER BY T1.num_pages DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many books written by Akira Watanabe are available on Gravity?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM author AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T1.author_name = 'Akira Watanabe'

question: Provide the full address of Ursola Purdy.
query: SELECT T3.street_number, T3.street_name, T3.city FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN customer_address AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN address AS T3 ON T3.address_id = T2.address_id INNER JOIN country AS T4 ON T4.country_id = T3.country_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Ursola' AND T1.last_name = 'Purdy'

question: Who is the author of the book The Mystery in the Rocky Mountains?
query: SELECT T3.author_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Mystery in the Rocky Mountains'

question: Identify the publisher of the book Girls' Night In.
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.title = 'Girls'' Night In'

question: Name the publisher of the oldest book.
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id ORDER BY T1.publication_date ASC LIMIT 1

question: Identify the cost difference between Priority and Express shipping methods.
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN method_name = 'Priority' THEN cost ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN method_name = 'Express' THEN cost ELSE 0 END) FROM shipping_method

question: How many orders have been cancelled in 2022?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_status AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE T1.status_value = 'Cancelled' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T2.status_date) = '2022'

question: List all the books published by BBC Audiobooks.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'BBC Audiobooks'

question: How many books were published in 2017?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book WHERE STRFTIME('%Y', publication_date) = '2017'

question: Provide the International Standard Book Number of the book The Mystery in the Rocky Mountains.
query: SELECT isbn13 FROM book WHERE title = 'The Mystery in the Rocky Mountains'

question: Among all orders updated in 2022, identify the percentage that has been returned.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.status_value = 'Returned' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM order_status AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE STRFTIME('%Y', T2.status_date) = '2022'

question: Among all addresses provided by customers, identify the percentage that are not in use anymore.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.address_status = 'Inactive' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM customer_address AS T1 INNER JOIN address_status AS T2 ON T2.status_id = T1.status_id

question: How many pages does 'Seaward' have?
query: SELECT num_pages FROM book WHERE title = 'Seaward'

question: Who is the author of First Things First?
query: SELECT T3.author_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T1.title = 'First Things First'

question: List all books authored by Tom Clancy.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Tom Clancy'

question: Which book by Hirohiko Araki was published on 6/6/2006?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Hirohiko Araki' AND T1.publication_date = '2006-06-06'

question: Who is the publisher of Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy: The Filming of the Douglas Adams classic?
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.title = 'Hitchhiker''s Guide To The Galaxy: The Filming of the Douglas Adams classic'

question: List all books published by ADV Manga.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'ADV Manga'

question: Write the full name of the customers whose address is at 55 Dorton Pass, Huangqiao.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN customer_address AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN address AS T3 ON T3.address_id = T2.address_id WHERE T3.street_number = 55 AND T3.street_name = 'Dorton Pass' AND T3.city = 'Huangqiao'

question: Which country is 9 Green Ridge Point, Arendal located at?
query: SELECT T2.country_name FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T2.country_id = T1.country_id WHERE T1.street_number = 9 AND T1.street_name = 'Green Ridge Point' AND T1.city = 'Arendal'

question: List 10 addresses located in Poland.
query: SELECT T1.street_number, T1.street_name, T1.city FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T2.country_id = T1.country_id WHERE T2.country_name = 'Poland' LIMIT 10

question: What is the shipping method ordered by Nicolette Sadler at 6/29/2020 7:40:07 PM?
query: SELECT T3.method_name FROM cust_order AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN shipping_method AS T3 ON T3.method_id = T1.shipping_method_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'Nicolette' AND T2.last_name = 'Sadler' AND T1.order_date = '2020-06-29 19:40:07'

question: List all books written in Arabic.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T2.language_name = 'Arabic'

question: Which language is 'El plan infinito' written in?
query: SELECT T2.language_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T1.title = 'El plan infinito'

question: What percentage of books written by Hirohiko make up the number of books published by Viz Media?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.author_name = 'Hirohiko Araki' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM author AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T2.author_id = T1.author_id INNER JOIN book AS T3 ON T3.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T4.publisher_id = T3.publisher_id WHERE T4.publisher_name = 'VIZ Media'

question: What is the average number of book pages written by Zilpha Keatley Snyder?
query: SELECT AVG(T3.num_pages) FROM book_author AS T1 INNER JOIN author AS T2 ON T1.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN book AS T3 ON T3.book_id = T1.book_id WHERE T2.author_name = 'Zilpha Keatley Snyder'

question: What is the full name of customer with email ckupis4@tamu.edu?
query: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE email = 'ckupis4@tamu.edu'

question: Which book has the most number of pages?
query: SELECT title FROM book ORDER BY num_pages DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many books were written by author A.J. Ayer?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_author AS T1 INNER JOIN author AS T2 ON T1.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T2.author_name = 'A.J. Ayer'

question: Name the title of books written by author A.J.Ayer.
query: SELECT T3.title FROM book_author AS T1 INNER JOIN author AS T2 ON T1.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN book AS T3 ON T3.book_id = T1.book_id WHERE T2.author_name = 'A.J. Ayer'

question: The book name "The Season: A Candid Look at Broadway" was published by which publisher?
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Season: A Candid Look at Broadway'

question: What is the average of English books among all books published by Carole Marsh Mysteries?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.language_name = 'English' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(*) FROM book_language AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T3.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T3.publisher_name = 'Carole Marsh Mysteries'

question: Name the title of the book with the most number of pages that was published from 1990 to 2000 by publisher Free Press.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Free Press' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T1.publication_date) BETWEEN '1990' AND '2000' ORDER BY T1.num_pages DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the order price of the book "The Servant Leader" in 2003?
query: SELECT T2.price FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T1.title = 'The Servant Leader' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T1.publication_date) = '2003'

question: What is the current address of customer Kandy?
query: SELECT T3.street_number, T3.street_name, T3.city FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN customer_address AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN address AS T3 ON T3.address_id = T2.address_id INNER JOIN address_status AS T4 ON T4.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Kandy'

question: How many books were ordered by customer Kandy Adamec?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T2.order_id = T1.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T3.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T3.first_name = 'Kandy' AND T3.last_name = 'Adamec'

question: How many orders got returned in 2022?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_status AS T1 INNER JOIN order_history AS T2 ON T1.status_id = T2.status_id WHERE T1.status_value = 'Returned' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T2.status_date) = '2022'

question: Which country does the customer with the email "rturbitt2@geocities.jp" from?
query: SELECT T4.country_name FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN customer_address AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN address AS T3 ON T3.address_id = T2.address_id INNER JOIN country AS T4 ON T4.country_id = T3.country_id WHERE T1.email = 'rturbitT2@geocities.jp'

question: Name the publisher who published the most books.
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id GROUP BY T2.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.publisher_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the title of the first book that was written by A.J. Ayer?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'A.J. Ayer' ORDER BY T1.publication_date ASC LIMIT 1

question: What is the percentage of books that cost greater than $10 and were ordered by customer Ruthanne Vatini?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.price > 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T2.order_id = T1.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T3.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T3.first_name = 'Ruthanne' AND T3.last_name = 'Vatini'

question: List the title of books published by AK Press.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'AK Press'

question: Who ordered the book with the cheapest price?
query: SELECT T3.first_name, T3.last_name FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T2.order_id = T1.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T3.customer_id = T2.customer_id ORDER BY T1.price ASC LIMIT 1

question: List down the ISBN of the books purchased by the customer with an email of fsier3e@ihg.com.
query: SELECT T1.isbn13 FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T4.email = 'fsier3e@ihg.com'

question: Give the author's name of the books that cost 19 dollars and above.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.author_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN order_line AS T4 ON T4.book_id = T1.book_id WHERE T4.price > 19

question: Provide the publisher name of the book with ISBN 76092025986.
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.isbn13 = 76092025986

question: Among the books published by Birlinn in 2008, how many books have pages around 600 to 700?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Birlinn' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T1.publication_date) = '2008' AND T1.num_pages BETWEEN 600 AND 700

question: What is the price of the book with ISBN 9780763628321?
query: SELECT T2.price FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T1.isbn13 = 9780763628321

question: What is the number of pages of the book in the order ID 1167?
query: SELECT T1.num_pages FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T2.order_id = 1167

question: Provide the title of the books published in British-English.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T2.language_name = 'British English'

question: How many books were published by Brava in 2006?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Brava' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T1.publication_date) = '2006'

question: Provide the ISBN and price of the book with book ID 7160.
query: SELECT T1.isbn13, T2.price FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T2.book_id = 6503

question: What is the title of the book in the order ID 931?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T2.order_id = 931

question: What is the language of the book titled Zorro?
query: SELECT T2.language_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T1.title = 'Zorro'

question: Provide the email of the customers that purchased books with a price range of 3 to 5 dollars.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.email FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN cust_order AS T2 ON T2.order_id = T1.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T3.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T1.price BETWEEN 3 AND 5

question: List the ISBN of the books that cost 7.5 dollars.
query: SELECT T1.isbn13 FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T2.price = 7.5

question: Give the publisher's name of the books authored by Alan Lee.
query: SELECT T4.publisher_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T4.publisher_id = T1.publisher_id WHERE T3.author_name = 'Alan Lee' GROUP BY T4.publisher_name

question: What is the sum of the number of pages of the books ordered by Mick Sever?
query: SELECT SUM(T1.num_pages) FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN cust_order AS T3 ON T3.order_id = T2.order_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T4.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T4.first_name = 'Mick' AND T4.last_name = 'Sever'

question: Write down the author's name of the book most recently published.
query: SELECT T3.author_name FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN book_author AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN author AS T3 ON T3.author_id = T2.author_id ORDER BY T1.publication_date DESC LIMIT 1

question: In books published by Ace Book, what is the percentage of English books published?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.language_name = 'English' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) FROM book_language AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T3.publisher_id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T3.publisher_name = 'Ace Book'

question: Among the books purchased by less than 1 dollar, what is the difference between the number of books with less than 500 pages and books with greater than 500 pages?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.num_pages < 500 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T1.num_pages > 500 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dif FROM book AS T1 INNER JOIN order_line AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id WHERE T2.price < 1

question: What are the language and title of the ordered books with price less than 20% of the average price of all ordered books?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.language_name, T2.title FROM order_line AS T1 INNER JOIN book AS T2 ON T1.book_id = T2.book_id INNER JOIN book_language AS T3 ON T3.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T1.price * 100 < ( SELECT AVG(price) FROM order_line ) * 20
